description.english: Welcomed Xaria and Montgomery into your home.
Projected the negative on the wall
Stared at the big eye for too long.
Got run over by the bus.
Looked upon the visitors' true form.
Looked away from the visitor's true form.

displayName.english: Would you still love me if...

description.english: Stayed away from home for more than 8 hours.
Got angelic Fred to drop the act.
The Rat child grew big and strong.
Exchanged Massacre princess for the katana
Beat at least 10 different games in one playthrough.
Bought the trophy from Mutt’s shop
Reach an ending without taking a shower.
Reach an ending without making any friends.
Reach an ending without sleeping once.
Reach an ending without eating a single meal.
Reach an ending without playing a video game.
Reach an ending in only 3 days.
Tried hugging the Fred who bites.
Helped Frederic get rid of his portraits.
Complete a perfect ritual in Cursed Mode
Complete the game with a Rank of at least A.
Complete the game with a Rank of at least S.
Complete the game with a Rank of at least X.
The true canon ending of Look Outside.
Find the children in the sewers.
Speak with Sybil face to face.
Killed Eugene and robbed his home.
Complete a Mazes and Wizards campaign.
Do some gardening with a friend.
Help someone get some closure on their old life.
Help solve some conflicts in your community.
Have some time to yourself and let go.
